metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31621 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: MariaDB Server before 10.7 is vulnerable to Denial of Service. Inextra/mariabackup/ds_xbstream.cc, when an error occurs(stream_ctxt->dest_file == NULL) while executing the method xbstream_open,the held lock is not released correctly, which allows local users totrigger a denial of service due to the deadlock.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
